# to_tsv

Returns a tab delimited version of the table.

```ruby
require 'datamix'
using DataMix

data = file '../_data/basic.csv'
puts data.to_tsv

```

# Output

```
date	price
2015-03-11	2044
2015-03-12	2041
2015-03-13	2064
2015-03-16	2055
2015-03-17	2080
2015-03-18	2072
2015-03-19	2098
2015-03-20	2090
2015-03-23	2107
2015-03-24	2103
2015-03-25	2093
2015-03-26	2059
2015-03-27	2055
2015-03-30	2064
2015-03-31	2084
2015-04-01	2067
2015-04-02	2060
2015-04-06	2064
2015-04-07	2080
```
